definition: to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize

sentences.english: This old pine has undergone extreme weather but still stands tall and straight.
sentences.chinese: 這棵百年老松歷經了百年風雨依然樹身勁拔。

sentences.english: Poetry straightforward, uninhibited, elegant calligraphy, drawing fresh, soft on the outside inside, unique style.
sentences.chinese: 詩文真率豪放，書法勁拔飄逸，外柔內剛，獨具風采。
